description.p: This wood and canvas glider transforms into a phoenix when thrown. It will travel 1d20+5 to the nearest 5 feat. Any creature in its path must make a Dexterity saving throw(DC: 10 + PB) or take 1d10+Con damage. Or half damage on a failed save. If the roll to throw is 1, the glider breaks on impact and must be repaired using 10GP of Canvas and wood.

Royal Canesword
This canesword was presented to his Majesty High Arcohn Leidathus The 3rd over 150 years before Zephiri fell to the Omma. It was a gift from the northern Trade Federation in recognition of Zephiri's continuing favourable trade terms with them.

When attuned to this item you may as a bonus channel the noble power of those who have born the sword before. A number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest you may summon a past wielder who enters initiative until the end of your next turn.
